item.title: Joseph add a quote by Jerry Stahl, author of Permanent Midnight and I, Fatty
item.description: "Joseph Mattson writes like a guitar player with nineteen fingers—everywhere at once, stinging, dark and beautiful. Empty the Sun will take you to some strange places, but the trip is amazing. Mattson has written a truly inventive and vivid novel." -- Jerry Stahl, author of Permanent Midnight and I, Fatty

item.title: Joseph add a quote by James Greer
item.description: "Several passages induced the shiver of aesthetic bliss in my spine that Nabokov famously described as the indicator of good and true writing. The whole thing is by turns hilarious and hilariously sad, artfully pin-holed with melancholy (my favorite drink)… Empty the Sun is an impressive achievement, as well as an excellent and I believe as yet unused name for a rock band." -- James Greer

item.title: Joseph add a quote by Beth Lisick
item.description: "Joseph Mattson is a monster of a writer." -- Beth Lisick
